column7: Studies the major myths of Greece and Rome and their impact upon later art, music, and literature. Shares two hours of lecture with CLCV 111; additional hour of lecture-discussion for a closer analysis of topics. Credit is not given for both CLCV 115 and CLCV 111.
column9: Credit is not given for both CLCV 115 and CLCV 111.
column11: In the Fall and Spring semesters, students must register for one discussion and one lecture section.
